name: Plumb Center
description:
With over 500 branches nationwide, Plumb Center is a leading supplier of plumbing, heating and renewables products. 

Helping installers participate in Green Deal, by bringing together installer training, accreditation and assessment tools in an integrated package, supported by a complete range of Green Deal products, Plumb Center is also working towards becoming a Green Deal Provider.
address:
The Wolseley Center
Harrison Way
Spa Park Royal
Leamington Spa
Warwickshire
United Kingdom
CV31 3HH
